title: Proficiency
content: g Throw Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to Wisdom saving throws Cleric Lvl 1 Warlock Lvl 1 Wizard Lvl 1 Charisma Saving Throw Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to Charisma saving throws. Cleric Lvl 1 Warlock Lvl 1 Sorcerer Lvl1 Light Armour Proficiency Feature Wearing Light Armour will not impose disadvantage on your attacks or prevent the casting of Spells Cleric Lvl 1 Fighter Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Warlock Lvl 1 Githyanki Shield Dwarf Medium Armour Proficien
